channel.title: Health
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Health, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Got 3 minutes? This habit may help boost hope and reduce stress
item.description: Our social media feeds can push us to the dark side, with content full of strife and anger, or videos that make us feel bad about ourselves. But there is a way to reprogram what you see by making different choices. And a new study finds three to five minutes of inspiring content each day can help you feel more positive.
